personal.bio: Passionate AI Engineer with 3+ years of experience in building intelligent systems, fine-tuning large language models, and developing agentic AI solutions. I specialize in creating sophisticated chatbots and AI agents that solve real-world problems.

experience.description: Leading development of autonomous AI agents and multi-agent systems for enterprise clients.
achievements: Built 15+ production-ready AI agents serving 100k+ users
Reduced customer service costs by 60% through intelligent chatbot deployment
Led team of 5 engineers in developing agentic AI framework
Implemented RAG systems improving response accuracy by 40%

experience.description: Specialized in fine-tuning large language models and developing conversational AI systems.
achievements: Developed chatbot platform processing 1M+ conversations monthly
Optimized model inference reducing latency by 70%
Published 3 research papers on LLM optimization techniques

experience.description: Started career developing machine learning models and natural language processing solutions.
achievements: Built first production ML pipeline processing 10k+ daily requests
Implemented sentiment analysis system with 92% accuracy
Contributed to open-source AI libraries with 500+ GitHub stars
